headline: Will DuPont’s (DD) New Life Sciences and Food-Processing Products Subtly Shift Its Core Investment Narrative?
summary: In late January and early February 2026, DuPont launched three new offerings, FilmTec MXP RO-8038-FF for dairy processors, Liveo C6-8XX medical-grade liquid silicone rubber, and AmberLite FPA57 resin for organic acid purification, targeting efficiency, regulatory compliance, and ease of integration into existing industrial systems. Together, these products highlight DuPont’s focus on higher-value life sciences and food-processing technologies that can enhance customer productivity without...
